page.title: 02LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: The leisure facilities are very good in the area. There is a leisure centre with a swimming pool, a running track and lots of inside facilities. There are 3 housing estates, the Ermine Estate, St. Giles and Glebe Park. Glebe Park is still being built. There is one pub on the estate but no shops. They are going to build an adventure park on the estate but no one knows when it is going to be built. There is a museum called the Lincolnshire Life, it has a room where displays have been put up of peoples collections. There is also a windmill there which you can go round. In Bailgate there is a Roman well which has been dug up and there is Newport Arch which is the only Roman arch which cars can still go under in Britain. Matthew Bell age 13
